message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair.  I'm proposing we switch amounts. It's my turn to get a slightly better deal.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value decreases for you with each round. I'm offering a 51/49 split. It's better than what you'll get if you keep stalling.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The value is going down with every round. Let's just split it fairly 50/50 and end this.
